channel.title: Shp on Recology
channel.description: Recent content in Shp on Recology

item.title: Marine Regions data in R
item.description: UPDATE: pkg API has changed - updated the post below to work with the current CRAN version, submitted 2016-08-02 I was at a hackathon focused on Ocean Biogeographic Information System (OBIS) data back in November last year in Belgium. One project idea was to make it easier to get at data based on one or more marine regions. I was told that Marineregions.org is often used for shape files to get different regions to then do other work with.
